item.description:
Bring your beach chair or blanket and bug spray and join us for our 3rd annual Kimball's Cruise night. The band will be The Reminisants and the old cars, grilled food and ice cream are legendary. This is a fun outdoor event (weather dependent so watch for updates the day of the event). Once it starts getting too buggy we have been known to tip a few cold drinks at the Westford Grille after. Admission is only $3.00, parking is free and there are always lots of cars to walk around and gawk at. Come out and celebrate the beginning of summer!

NOTE: this event is "weather permitting" and if in doubt call
Kimballs Farm 978-486-3891.

This event will be organized by "Deb." Watch for her posts and comments as she updates location and info. Sorry I had a conflict and cannot attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Deb at the first table nearest the stage/band.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Kimball's Cruise Night
